00025 #include "OgreSceneManagerEnumerator.h"
00026 
00027 #include "OgreDynLibManager.h"
00028 #include "OgreDynLib.h"
00029 #include "OgreConfigFile.h"
00030 #include "OgreMaterial.h"
00031 #include "OgreException.h"
00032 
00033 
00034 namespace Ogre {
00035 
00036     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00037     template<> SceneManagerEnumerator* Singleton<SceneManagerEnumerator>::ms_Singleton = 0;
00038 
00039     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00040     SceneManagerEnumerator::SceneManagerEnumerator()
00041     {
00042         // Create default manager
00043         mDefaultManager = new SceneManager();
00044 
00045         // All scene types defaulted to begin with (plugins may alter this)
00046         setSceneManager(ST_GENERIC, mDefaultManager);
00047         setSceneManager(ST_EXTERIOR_FAR, mDefaultManager);
00048         setSceneManager(ST_EXTERIOR_CLOSE, mDefaultManager);
00049         setSceneManager(ST_INTERIOR, mDefaultManager);
00050 
00051 
00052 
00053     }
00054     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00055     SceneManager* SceneManagerEnumerator::getSceneManager(SceneType st)
00056     {
00057         SceneManagerList::iterator i = mSceneManagers.find(st);
00058 
00059         if (i != mSceneManagers.end())
00060         {
00061             return i->second;
00062         }
00063         else
00064         {
00065             Except(Exception::ERR_INTERNAL_ERROR, "Cannot find requested SceneManager.", "SceneManagerEnumerator::getSceneManager");
00066         }
00067     }
00068 
00069 
00070 
00071     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00072     void SceneManagerEnumerator::setRenderSystem(RenderSystem* rs)
00073     {
00074         std::set<SceneManager*>::iterator i = mUniqueSceneMgrs.begin();
00075 
00076         for(; i != mUniqueSceneMgrs.end(); ++i)
00077         {
00078             (*i)->_setDestinationRenderSystem(rs);
00079         }
00080 
00081     }
00082 
00083     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00084     void SceneManagerEnumerator::setSceneManager(SceneType st, SceneManager* sm)
00085     {
00086         // Find entry (may exist)
00087         SceneManagerList::iterator i = mSceneManagers.find(st);
00088 
00089         if (i == mSceneManagers.end())
00090         {
00091             // Insert
00092             mSceneManagers.insert(SceneManagerList::value_type(st, sm));
00093         }
00094         else
00095         {
00096             // Override
00097             i->second = sm;
00098         }
00099         // Add to unique set
00100         mUniqueSceneMgrs.insert(sm);
00101 
00102 
00103         // Set rendersystem, incase this one is late & rendersystem already picked
00104         sm->_setDestinationRenderSystem(Root::getSingleton().getRenderSystem());
00105 
00106 
00107 
00108     }
00109 
00110     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00111     SceneManagerEnumerator& SceneManagerEnumerator::getSingleton(void)
00112     {
00113         return Singleton<SceneManagerEnumerator>::getSingleton();
00114     }
